articles.author: joshkelliott
articles.title: Norway beach handball team fined for wearing shorts, not bikini bottoms - Global News
articles.description: European officials fined the women for wearing shorts instead of the standard skimpy bikini bottoms.
articles.content: Norway‘s women’s beach handball team has been fined for wearing athletic shorts instead of bikini bottoms in a bronze-medal match against Spain after officials deemed the shorts to be “improper cloth… [+3255 chars]
